General.Name: Sherborne Investors Guernsey C Ltd
General.Description: Sherborne Investors (Guernsey) C Limited is an open-ended equity mutual fund. The fund is launched and managed by Sherborne Investors Management (Guernsey) LLC. It invests in the public equity markets. The fund seeks to invest in growth and value stocks of companies. Sherborne Investors (Guernsey) C Limited is domiciled in the Guernsey, Channel Islands.
General.Address: 135 East 57th Street, New York, NY, United States, 10022
